mapper.select: select id, uid, rent_time, return_time, create_time, update_time, tenant_id from t_enterprise_rent_record where id = #{id}

select any_value ( id ) id, any_value ( uid ) uid, any_value ( rent_membercard_order_id ) rent_membercard_order_id, any_value ( return_membercard_order_id ) return_membercard_order_id, any_value ( rent_time ) rent_time, any_value ( return_time ) return_time, any_value ( create_time ) create_time, any_value ( update_time ) update_time, any_value ( tenant_id ) tenant_id from t_enterprise_rent_record where uid = #{uid} and rent_time is not null and return_time is not null GROUP BY FROM_UNIXTIME(update_time / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d' );

select id, uid, rent_membercard_order_id,return_membercard_order_id, rent_time, return_time, create_time, update_time, tenant_id from t_enterprise_rent_record where uid = #{uid} and return_time is null order by id desc limit 1

select r.id, r.uid, r.rent_membercard_order_id, r.return_membercard_order_id, r.rent_time, r.return_time, r.create_time, r.update_time, r.tenant_id from t_enterprise_rent_record r left join t_user_info u on u.uid = r.uid where r.return_time is not null
and u.tenant_id = 1014
